Question.Subject: Anyone else having 4Shared problems?
Question.Content:
I am a frequent 4Shared user. I love my music, alright? It's a safer alternative compared to LimeWire. (Which I used to use) But my point: Whenever I try to search on there, or even go to their homepage, I get this message: "The connection was reset The connection to the server was reset while the page was loading. The site could be temporarily unavailable or too busy. Try again in a few moments. If you are unable to load any pages, check your computer's network connection. If your computer or network is protected by a firewall or proxy, make sure that Firefox is permitted to access the Web."
It's rather obvious that I use FireFox. Help me? Thanks! (:
Question.ChosenAnswer: yeah hun i had that same trouble i had to close it down. then download it again it was ok then for a while. i got all the songs i wanted in a hurry. closed it then. they say that bearshares ok but i never had it glk,..,
